name: Line of Sight (itch) (wimlach)
description:
2D Line of sight that takes into account 'height' of tiles to determine occlusion and view range. Higher vantage points give further range, high ground occludes lower ground beyond (but not higher locations).

Arrow keys to navigate.

'M' to toggle journey memory (keeps previously occupied tiles visible but dimmed).

'V' to toggle view bullet visibility.

'R' to reset.
